English: Halfway into Bagango we started taking fire from\nsome SLA troops dressed in Royal uniforms.
For a moment, I thought we’d been suckered\ninto some horrible trap.
Soon enough, though, we figured it out.
Our unit was the first to breach the palace.
We swept into Torres’s office and found him\nthere with a gun to his head.
We stopped to watch him take himself out\nof the game, but he couldn’t do it.
Once we got tired of waiting, we knocked him\nto the ground and cuffed him.
The people around here all seem surprised we’re not\nred-horned devils out to eat their children.
Who knows what kind of crappy propaganda Torres\nshoved down their throats over the years?
All I know is I’m looking forward to going\nhome now more than ever.
I thought I missed my wife and kid before, but now\nI’m looking forward to a little boredom and to being\nassigned to Fort Living Room for a good, long while.
